Articles.Content: I like to build and fly planes from the SPH.  I try to challenge myself by flying in IVA mode sometimes.  When I do this, I zoom out to see the entire cockpit, view, etc.  When I do this though, part of the kerbal's head gets in the way of the camera.  I have come up with a solution: Remove the head.  (Only for the kerbal that is being 'used,' of course).  This would clean up the view making the craft easier to control.  I learned this after taking a closer look at the game Halo: Combat Evolved.  In it, where you are in the cryo tube, the head got in the camera's way, so the devs removed it for that bit of game.  Again, I think a similar solution would make IVA easier to use.  Good luck, devs!  ;-)
I hate times in games where your own head gets in the way of what you're looking at! It's an absurd problem to have!
